verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* enemies \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* captivity \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Zorobabel, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* ye do: \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Asor Haddan \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* hither.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Zorobabel, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Josue, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w*: \w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H6680"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w ourselves|strong="H0587"\w* alone \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Persians hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* hindered \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* troubled \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* counsellors \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* frustrate \w their|strong="H3605"\w* design \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Persians.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Assuerus, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* \w accusation|strong="H7855"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Juda \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w*, Beselam, Mithridates, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Thabeel, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* council \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Persians: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w letter|strong="H3791"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* accusation \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Syriac, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* read \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Syrian tongue.

Reum Beelteem, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Samsai \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3790"\w* \w a|strong="H2298"\w* \w letter|strong="H0104"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w*, \w in|strong="H5922"\w* this manner:

Reum Beelteem, \w and|strong="H0116"\w* Samsai \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w* \w and|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H0756"\w* their counsellors, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Dinites, \w and|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Apharsathacites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Therphalites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Apharsites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Erchuites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Babylonians|strong="H0896"\w*, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Susanechites, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Dievites, \w and|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Elamites|strong="H5962"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0524"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H5103"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w nations|strong="H0524"\w*, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w and|strong="H0524"\w* glorious Asenaphar brought over: \w and|strong="H0524"\w* made \w to|strong="H1541"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3488"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* cities \w of|strong="H5103"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8115"\w* \w and|strong="H0524"\w* \w in|strong="H3488"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w of|strong="H5103"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* countries \w of|strong="H5103"\w* this side \w of|strong="H5103"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w* \w in|strong="H3488"\w* peace.

(\w This|strong="H1836"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w letter|strong="H0104"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* him:) \w To|strong="H5922"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, thy \w servants|strong="H5649"\w*, \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* side \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w send|strong="H7972"\w* greeting.

\w Be|strong="H1934"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* \w up|strong="H5559"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* thee \w to|strong="H5922"\w* us, \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w come|strong="H0858"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w a|strong="H1934"\w* rebellious \w and|strong="H4430"\w* wicked \w city|strong="H7149"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w are|strong="H1768"\w* \w building|strong="H1124"\w*, setting \w up|strong="H5559"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* ramparts thereof \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w repairing|strong="H2338"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w walls|strong="H7792"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w it|strong="H2006"\w* \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w to|strong="H5142"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w* up, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* thereof repaired, \w they|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w pay|strong="H5415"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4061"\w* \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w toll|strong="H1983"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* yearly revenues, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w loss|strong="H5142"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* fail upon \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* remembering \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w salt|strong="H4416"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* eaten \w in|strong="H1965"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w we|strong="H1768"\w* count \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* crime \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w see|strong="H2370"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* wronged, \w have|strong="H4430"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6903"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* certified \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*,

\w That|strong="H1768"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* may \w be|strong="H1240"\w* \w made|strong="H3046"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w books|strong="H5609"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* histories \w of|strong="H4481"\w* thy \w fathers|strong="H0002"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* thou shalt \w find|strong="H7912"\w* written \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* records: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* shalt \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H5648"\w* rebellious \w city|strong="H7149"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* hurtful \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4083"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* wars \w were|strong="H1768"\w* raised therein \w of|strong="H4481"\w* old time: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* cause also \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* destroyed.

\w We|strong="H0586"\w* certify \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* be \w built|strong="H1124"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w walls|strong="H7792"\w* thereof repaired, thou shalt \w have|strong="H0383"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w possession|strong="H2508"\w* on \w this|strong="H1836"\w* side \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5675"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* word \w to|strong="H5922"\w* Reum Beelteem \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Samsai \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* their council, inhabitants \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8115"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H5675"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, sending greeting \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w peace|strong="H8001"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5922"\w* accusation, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w* have \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* us, hath been plainly \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w*,

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* commanded: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w search|strong="H1240"\w* hath been \w made|strong="H5648"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* old time hath rebelled \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* seditions \w and|strong="H4430"\w* wars \w have|strong="H4430"\w* been raised therein.

\w For|strong="H5922"\w* there \w have|strong="H4430"\w* been \w powerful|strong="H8624"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, who hare \w had|strong="H4430"\w* dominion \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* country \w that|strong="H4430"\w* is \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w river|strong="H5103"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w have|strong="H4430"\w* received \w tribute|strong="H4061"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w toll|strong="H1983"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* revenues.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* therefore hear \w the|strong="H1124"\w* sentence: Hinder \w those|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, \w that|strong="H2942"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w city|strong="H7149"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w built|strong="H1124"\w*, till further \w orders|strong="H2942"\w* \w be|strong="H3705"\w* given \w by|strong="H7761"\w* me.

See \w that|strong="H4430"\w* \w you|strong="H5922"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* not \w negligent|strong="H7960"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* executing \w this|strong="H1836"\w*, lest by little \w and|strong="H4430"\w* little \w the|strong="H5922"\w* evil grow \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* hurt \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* edict \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w read|strong="H7123"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* Reum Beelteem, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Samsai \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5613"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* their counsellors: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* \w went|strong="H0236"\w* \w up|strong="H6925"\w* \w in|strong="H0236"\w* \w haste|strong="H0924"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* hindered \w them|strong="H1994"\w* \w with|strong="H5922"\w* arm \w and|strong="H4430"\w* power.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* interrupted, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w ceased|strong="H0989"\w* till \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w second|strong="H8648"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w reign|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Persians|strong="H6540"\w*.
